title: Pali is ‘the text language’, that is, the language traditionally known as Magadhi which from around the first century BCE was developed for the presentation of Theravada scriptures. In 1881 the Pali Text Society was founded by T.W.Rhys Davids. It has published most of the Pali Canon in the Roman alphabet. 7 The Baskets have distinct subject-matters. The first, the Vinayapitaka, treats of the discipline and history of the Buddhist Order
